QuestData.Title: A Soul Saved
QuestData.Description:
Vyraz... all this time...
This cannot stand, $n. We must avenge Krexus and cut him down!
He must have sent you to the Maw expecting that you would never return. He underestimated you. A fatal mistake.
Go with Mograine and claim Vyraz's head. I will warn our forces at the Seat of the Primus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Alexandros Mograine at the House of the Chosen in Maldraxxus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Alexandros Mograine at the House of the Chosen in Maldraxxus.
QuestData.RewardText: I cannot allow this wound to fester any longer. I will burn it closed here and now!
